entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XML documentation refers to non-existing Device.OnIdiom / Device.OnPlatform methods #12183
  • Images in CollectionView displayed incorrectly #12182
  • Refreshing Observable Collection Generates InvalidOperationException #12181
  • Setting IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate programmatically doesn't work #12180
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12176
  • iOS - Screen containing nested scrolling creating extra white space at the bottom #12175
  • Option to disable OnBackPressed in a BlazorWebView component #12171
  • Notes tutorial on macOS is blank #12166
  • [Bug] Shell NavigationStack[0] is always null, and Shell.PresentationMode="Modal" doesn't put the Page into ModalStack #12162
  • [Bug] ShellContent IsVisible causes wrong items displayed in flyout, on Windows #12159
  • iOS Page.LargeTitleDisplay does not work on iOS 16.1 Simulators #12156

Closed

  • ScrollView not working, not reacting to when keyboard is opened #9450
  • Azure DevOps builds failing with latest version of MAUI #12122
  • [iOS] CarouselView DataTemplateSelector NullReferenceException #9833
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Class Library build in the Release config fails to compile for the Windows target whereas Debug config works fine #12100
  • Android Release Mode app crash during startup #12165
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6 version 7.0.1..." #12046
  • Flickering WebView #12089
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.0 to 17.4.1 #12169
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #12155

Merged

  • [net7.0] Don't add public api to net7.0 #12177
  • [net7.0] Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12168
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • [net6.0] Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12167
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12172
  • [net6.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12128
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Fix crash using DataTemplateSelector CarouselView #12170
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #12141
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #12139
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #12138
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #12147
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Make OnShouldReceiveMapTouch static #12142
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-map
  • [net7.0] Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #12146
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #12145
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #12148
  • Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12114
  • Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12135
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
